documents.document: @SLSWarren the show goes on! :)
@DeanneColley I don't think so. We've definitely had to change plans before (film at studio instead of in a forest due to windstorm, etc).
@Peeardee Thanks! You too :)
@Peeardee That sounds like a good idea!
@Peeardee Yeah I have a feeling tomorrow's drive to work is going to be GREAT...
I'm only here for the Lady Gaga halftime show. #SB51 (at the same time, wow go Atlanta!)
Head's up, Vancouver friends... #bcstorm https://t.co/TAMCejbzrX
@DeanneColley We were concerned about that, but sometimes you just have to roll with the weather ;)
@fredsfam snow doesn't stop us :) presents interesting challenges sometimes, but we persevere!
@DeanneColley Haha, yes I think we will!
@AZGrammy5 Fourth floor! Top floor of this building. :)
@SkyBoivin oh that's a good idea! I don't think either her or her mom have ever really experienced snow before. :)
Currently writing with @fadeinsoftware for the first time and wow I am liking this a lot. #writing
Emrys is fascinated... she has been trying to catch the flakes that hit our window. ❄ https://t.co/51mNU3nJ0O
@TankEWinchester ahh thank you so much :) You stay safe as well, friend!
@mjimersonmorris Thank you! I love it so much, was so lucky to get this place ❤️
@TankEWinchester At least the main roads are relatively clear right now... :)
Wow they are getting a LOT of snow in the valley! Stay safe, friends out that way... https://t.co/qFzjym8vgy
@DonnaY1legwondr That's definitely the vehicle for snow driving! :)
@TryToStalkMeNow It's usually a little easier to get around them safely when you're not off-roading through slush/ice. ;)
@TryToStalkMeNow Hehehe it's more 'I choose to remain in so as to avoid the people who can't drive in snow' :P
@DonnaY1legwondr It really does! I quite like it, as long as I don't have to drive anywhere in it :)
@DonnaY1legwondr we've been hovering around 0C, most of this morning has been -2C. Yesterday we had those giant bunches of warm snow :P
@megfitz89 more snow falling now! this is SO WEIRD our winters are never like this haha
@Peeardee @rachlanger @MPJulian hey we're in the same riding! Awesome!
Hard to see in the photo but it is snowing HARD right now... ❄ https://t.co/zRFFImfhM0
@Wonderbene Oh very nice! It looks so peaceful. :)
@rachlanger I heard back from mine! Clearly a letter that was sent to everyone, but at least it was a response...
@megfitz89 I went for a walk and it was this deep, then went out later and it was deeper! https://t.co/DkznaXJDYQ
@JoleaB Hahaha I just tried and I made myself laugh. Thank you!
Why hello, thundersnow lightning!
@JoleaB well as it happens that's exactly where I am :)
@Peeardee Definitely! Ahhh I hope someone has this for us...
@Pathryn34 I didn't even think it could happen here. Awesome.
@Peeardee Exciting! I wonder if anyone was able to get photos of the lightning?
@Peeardee I can see fog up the hill from where I am! Also, I love the name thunderfogsnow. Excellent.
@Peeardee DID YOU HEAR THE THUNDER?
@Pathryn34 I've never experienced this before! It's new and exciting!
@fangirlingjess HA. I think you're right.
So apparently our crazy weather has taken a turn toward thundersnow here...?? Wow. Also, cool.
@TankEWinchester that's a good picture too! looks like you've had a lot of snow :)
@paula2809 Yikes. I hear there's more on the way, too... stay safe and warm!
@paula2809 oh wow, you've got a lot of snow!
@anicat haha! that's definitely different from here. I think all our flowers are in hiding :P
Winter on the river... #bcstorm https://t.co/43Mgo7vXJx
Saturday morning update: oh yes, snowed in. ❄
@Peeardee yay! Enjoy a cozy weekend at home :)
@Peeardee haha not weird, I'm pretty excited about it! 😊
Home with the kittens, stocked with groceries, and I am ready to be snowed in this weekend. Bring it on, #bcstorm! ❄
@megfitz89 haha I should be good for that later - just went out for some fresh air :)
Walking in a winter wonderland... #SPNoftheNorth #officeshenanigans https://t.co/5V77FkSfgv
@JoBelleCee It's definitely a weird winter - the weather isn't following any of the normal patterns!
@megfitz89 I know right? This winter has been crazy! #SPNoftheNorth :D
It's snowing so hard now people are singing Christmas songs in the office. #officeshenanigans
@Peeardee Good luck and drive safe! ❤️
@Peeardee Yikes! Drive safe! Looks like the worst of it is happening between 2:30pm and 5:30pm...
The transport captain and I just looked at the weather radar for this afternoon... That's a LOT of snow coming our way! #officeshenanigans
Our crew is doing such a good job of dealing with this snow. The show must go on! :) #officeshenanigans
How long before our cars are buried, I wonder... ❄ #officeshenanigans https://t.co/RIknbKnIZK
@Peeardee okay now I want to do that just so it can be true, haha!
I love it. Office snow ball fight via snow balls in cups, placed politely on desks! It's going to be great. ;)… https://t.co/ZI6klvRxl1
@Peeardee Oh wow! That's very cool though, getting to see that kind of science in action on a small scale :D
@Peeardee It's the world's slowest most polite indoor snowball fight?
@Peeardee Ha! That ice pile is going to turn into a nice snow hill soon... ;)
Arrived to a cup of snow on my desk... whaaat? (I'm very curious about what this message means.) #officeshenanigans https://t.co/h6TmGk3NCe
@vaught88 this is significant supporting evidence for your snow-kindred status. ❄
@vaught88 *gasps* You might just be. But I hear snow doesn't like sunny southern climates too much...
@vaught88 it's a magical, mythical thing... you might have seen it in a movie or two, perhaps...
@fangirlingjess but also, 😂
#snowfallwarning ❄ https://t.co/cmByi7x1Zh
Watching Riverdale and HEY IS THAT RIVERVIEW (Yes, yes it is.) #vancouverfilmlocations
@fangirlingjess I COULDN'T HELP IT

'We come in peace!' #Supernatural #LilySunder
@megfitz89 Really?? I need to know more about this that's awesome
